issue.title: Ability to define duration of a constant instruction

content.raw: Ian suggest a keyword argument `block_until` to instructions, which seems like a good name to disambiguate from other instruction time intervals like the duration of the ramp. `block_until` sounds like it takes an absolute time, so the argument should be an absolute time, or named `block_for` or similar if its a duration.
